branchCategory.name: ALT
branchCategory.description: <P>Auto feed tank series ALT is used with the auto feed lube unit series ALF. This system makes lubrication work unnecessary, thus significantly reducing the amount of maintenance labor. The problem of running out of oil is prevented because the oil is fed automatically. </P>
